tool_description: Evaluates the quality, sourcing, and nutritional value of pet food ingredients, ranking them by biological value and processing methods.

ingredients.description: List of ingredients to assess for quality

species.description: Target species: dog, cat, rabbit, bird, or ferret

first_five_ingredients.description: First five ingredients from the label

processing_method.description: Processing method: extruded, baked, freeze_dried, raw, or air_dried

error_messages: Insufficient ingredients: Provide at least one ingredient to assess
Invalid first five: Must provide exactly 5 ingredients for the first five ingredients
Unsupported species: Use one of [dog, cat, rabbit, bird, ferret]
Invalid processing method: Use one of [extruded, baked, freeze_dried, raw, air_dried]
Missing protein sources: At least one protein source must be specified
usage: Provide complete ingredients list, species, first_five_ingredients, and protein_sources. Optionally include fat_sources, carb_sources, and processing_method for detailed quality assessment.

protein_quality_rating.description: Protein quality assessment: excellent, good, adequate, or poor

concerning_ingredients.description: List of lower-quality or concerning ingredients

processing_impact.description: Assessment of processing method on nutrient retention

ingredient_transparency.description: Assessment of ingredient naming and specificity
